statement.en: Padma is an exceptional English teacher. In all my interactions with her, I’ve been consistently impressed by her natural and confident command of the language. Her pronunciation is clear and standard, and her grammar is excellent. As a native English speaker, I’ve never once struggled to understand her — she communicates with ease, accuracy, and clarity.
statement.zh: Padma 是一位非常優秀的英文教師。在與她互動的過程中，我總是對她自然且自信的英文表達能力印象深刻。她對語言的掌握極為出色，說話口音標準清晰，讓人容易理解。作為一位英語母語者，我從未在理解她的溝通上遇到任何困難；她總是以清楚、準確且輕鬆的方式傳達訊息。
